Title: Batman
Overview: Batman must face his most ruthless nemesis when a deformed madman calling himself "The Joker" seizes control of Gotham's criminal underworld.
Tagline: Have you ever danced with the devil in the pale moonlight?
Keywords: double life, dc comics, dual identity, chemical, crime fighter, fictional place, gotham city, superhero, super powers
production_companies: PolyGram Filmed Entertainment, The Guber-Peters Company, Warner Bros.
Cast: Jack Nicholson, Michael Keaton, Kim Basinger
